nodes.text: Fate of the Jedi: Dramatis Personae

Fate of the Jedi: Dramatis Personae is a downloadable reference book that serves as a preview to the Fate of the Jedi novel series. It was published by Del Rey books and made available on StarWars.com on March 18, 2009 as a free PDF. Including a twelve-page excerpt from Fate of the Jedi: Outcast, the first volume of Fate of the Jedi, it is twenty-three pages long.
It was included in the paperback edition of The Old Republic: Deceived.

The guide includes a brief synopsis of the state of the galaxy in 43 ABY and short biographies of important characters from the forthcoming series. Licensed illustrations by various artists, all collected from previously published Star Wars works, are included throughout. The biographies are as follows:
